EttersendDokuPanel.title: Send dokumentasjon til en søknad du har sendt inn

text.p1: Dokumentasjon kan sendes til søknader du har sendt inn tidligere.
text.p3: Åpne søknaden du ønsker å ettersende dokumenter til
text.p4: Last opp dokumentene du skal ettersende under “dine vedlegg”

PabegynteSoknaderPanel.title: Continue with an application you have started
PabegynteSoknaderPanel.pabegynte: {count, plural, =1 {One started application} other {# started applications}}
PabegynteSoknaderPanel.slettesEtter: Please note that the started applications will be deleted after {DAYS_BEFORE_DELETION} days.

NySoknadInfo.feilet: An error occurred when setting up the application. Please try later

text.p1: Please complete the application as best you can. Attach relevant documentation.
text.p2: See examples of <lenke>what documentation we might ask for</lenke>.
text.p3: If you intentionally withhold or provide incorrect information, you may have to pay back the benefit.

innhenting.title: Collecting and processing of personal data

text.p1: We automatically collect information from public registers. By pressing "Start application" you accept this.
text.p2: <lenke>Read more about collecting and processing of your personal data</lenke>.

nodsituasjon.title: Are you in an emergency situation?
nodsituasjon.text: If you do not have money for food or a place to stay for the next 24 hours, you should mention this in your application.

PersonbeskyttelseFeilmelding.title: Sorry
PersonbeskyttelseFeilmelding.text: Unfortunately, you cannot use the digital application for financial assistance. People with code 6 or 7 cannot apply for financial assistance digitally. Contact your local <lenke>Nav office</lenke> to receive help applying.
